name: So, You're Possessed!
storyline:
Love a good “demon meets human, demon uses human, demon unlocks apocalyptic force within human” story?

Help uncover the mysterious plot that draws an eclectic group of otherworldly beings together! Because a lousy delivery job, an unemployed roommate, and delayed graduation aren't stressful enough without adding possession or an epic battle between the forces of good and evil to the list.

Choose carefully! It's going to take a little mortal ingenuity, divine intervention, and plain dumb luck to navigate your soul to safety in this first installment of a multipart series.
summary: So, You're Possessed! is a 50,000 word contemporary fantasy novel where your choices impact how the tale unfolds. It's entirely text-based - without graphics or sound effects - and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination. Will you nurture friendships or fight your demons alone? Should you keep your dark side contained? Can you unlock all 26 achievements?
